official_title: A Phase 2 Study of ALX148 in Combination with Pembrolizumab and Chemotherapy in Patients with Advanced Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma (ASPEN-04)
inclusion_criteria:
* Previously untreated metastatic or unresectable, recurrent head and neck squamous cell carcinoma.
* Adequate bone marrow function.
* Adequate renal and liver function.
* Adequate ECOG performance status.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Patients with known symptomatic CNS metastases or leptomeningeal disease requiring steroids.
* History of (non-infectious) pneumonitis that required steroids or current pneumonitis.
* Prior treatment with any anti-CD47 or anti-SIRPÎ± agent.
* Prior treatment with anti-PD-1 or PD-L1.
